text: Group A of the 2015 Africa Cup of Nations qualification tournament is one of the nine groups to decide the teams which qualify for the 2015 Africa Cup of Nations finals tournament. Group A consists of four teams: South Africa, Congo, Nigeria, and Sudan, where they play against each other home-and-away in a round-robin format. == Standings == == Matches == \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- == Goalscorers == == Discipline == == Notes == == References == == External links == *Orange Africa Cup Of Nations Qualifiers, CAFonline.com Group A
title: 2015 Africa Cup of Nations qualification Group A
